dcterms:creator: A. Conneau
R. Rinott
G. Lample
A. Williams
S. Bowman
H. Schwenk
V. Stoyanov
dcterms:description: XNLI is a dataset for evaluating cross-lingual natural language inference, consisting of 2,500 development and 5,000 test instances translated from English into 14 languages by professional translators.
dcterms:title: XNLI dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Schwenk
X. Li
dcterms:description: MLDoc is a multilingual document classification dataset that includes 1,000 training and development documents and 4,000 test documents for each language, divided into 4 different genres.
dcterms:title: MLDoc dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Zweigenbaum
S. Sharoff
R. Rapp
dcterms:description: BUCC is a dataset for bitext mining, consisting of comparable corpora in different languages, used to identify sentence pairs that are translations of each other.
dcterms:title: BUCC dataset

dcterms:description: Tatoeba is an open collection of English sentences and high-quality translations into more than 300 languages, constructed based on community contributions.
dcterms:title: Tatoeba dataset

dcterms:creator: JÃ¶rg Tiedemann
dcterms:description: Europarl is a parallel corpus consisting of the proceedings of the European Parliament, available in multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Europarl dataset

dcterms:description: The United Nations dataset consists of multilingual parallel texts from UN documents, used for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: United Nations dataset

dcterms:description: OpenSubtitles2018 is a parallel corpus of movie subtitles in 57 languages, used for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: OpenSubtitles2018 dataset

dcterms:description: Global Voices is a multilingual corpus of news stories from the Global Voices website, used for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Global Voices dataset

dcterms:description: Tanzil is a dataset of Quran translations in multiple languages, used for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: Tanzil dataset
